com.interpss.simu.multicase.rule
Interface BranchActionRule

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
BranchActionRuleImpl
public interface BranchActionRule
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject

A representation of the model object 'Branch Action Rule'. Class for defining branch action rule. Branch rule is evaluated against branch rating limit. It has a set of conditions and a set of branch actions, which are BranchModification objects. All rule conditions use the same condition operator (AND or OR).

The following features are supported:

  • Parent
  • Opt Type
  • Branch Condition
  • Branch Action

See Also:
MCaseRulePackage.getBranchActionRule()

getBranchCondition

org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<BranchCondition> getBranchCondition()
Returns the value of the 'Branch Condition' containment reference list. The list contents are of type BranchCondition. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Parent'.
